author: Tom Smith
title: Saudi Arabia oil attacks: Weapons debris 'proves Iran behind them'
article: Saudi Arabia's defence ministry has shown off what it says is wreckage of drones and cruise missiles that proves Iranian involvement in weekend attacks on two oil facilities.

author: John Major
title: Burger King ditches free toys and will 'melt' old ones
article: Burger King will no longer give away plastic toys with children's meals, amid pressure to reduce plastic waste.

author: Charlie Bucket
title: British Airways pilots call off next week's strike
article: British Airways pilots have called off the next strike in their dispute, which had been scheduled for 27 September.

author: Ebeneezer Scrooge
title: Inflation surprise as computer game prices drop
article: Inflation growth slowed sharply in August to 1.7% after computer game prices dropped and clothing prices were slow to recover from the summer sales.
